description:
This utility allows you to easily disable/enable ActiveX components on Internet Explorer browser.

It disables the desired ActiveX component by setting the "kill bit" of the desired CLSID under the following Registry key: `HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\ActiveX Compatibility`

For more information about this Registry key, read this [Microsoft article](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?kbid=240797).
author: Nir Sofer
